1.content:
It was a fantastic concert, you had a spot on the front row and the music was awesome. You bounced around and the fact that your crush, Hayley, agreed to go with you made it the perfect night. After two hours of non-stop moshing, the band finally finished their set.

Amongst the crowd of people, you finally managed to squeeze out of the doors into the cold winters night outside. You had agreed not to drink anything so you could take Hayley home, but you didn't let that spoil the night as you walked down to your car. You got into your car and began heading over to Hayley's apartment.

"I had a great night Hayley! I didn't know you were into the same music as me, we should do this again", you exclaimed to Hayley.

"Definitely! I didn't know you were so much fun", Hayley giggled to herself as you chuckled slightly.

You had that feeling in the pit of your stomach that something could come out of this as you pulled up outside Hayley's apartment. She looked at you with a wild look in her eyes and you looked back, you couldn't control yourself as your head lurched into Hayley's face and began to make out for a few minutes.

"D-Do you want to come inside?" Hayley asked...
1.title: The Concert

11.content:
"Of course!" You exclaimed to Hayley's request.

You both got out your car as Hayley pulled you by your hand. You managed to just lock your car before being pulled inside the entrance of the apartment block and into the elevator. You went up to the tenth floor before being led to room 1018, as Hayley fumbled around with her keys to unlock the door.

Once inside, it was a bog-standard apartment for someone in their twenties as she led you to the living room. You took a seat on the couch, feeling a little nervous as this was the girl of your dreams. You had been acquaintances for a few years but lacked the confidence to make your move, however, it was all about change.

"Would you like a drink of something? Vodka? Beer? Water?" Hayley asked you.
11.title: "Of course!"

111.content:
"Maybe a vodka?" You replied as Hayley disappeared into the kitchen.

You heard the sound of shot glasses being moved and a bottle being poured. A few minutes later she returned with two shots before handing you one.

"On three...one...two...three" Hayley counted down as you swung back the vodka in one, immediately cringing at the sour taste.

"What is in that? That's the strongest stuff I've ever tasted!" You exclaimed as you tried to get the taste out of your mouth.

"Oh, it's just an old family recipe" Hayley replied as she sat down next to you, before stroking your crotch with her fingers.

After that shot, you just couldn't focus. All you could do was focus on Hayley's cat as he slept on the armchair opposite you. Your vision started to grow fuzzier by the second before going black.

After what felt like the longest sleep of your life, you opened your eyes. You stretched and rubbed your face as your vision started to clear, but where were you?
111.title: "Maybe a vodka?"

1111.content:
You groaned in pain as you see your reflection in what looked like a glass wall. Confused you stood up to see it was a glass floor beneath your feet. You turned around to see another glass wall. You looked up to see a cap screwed on tight above you.

It suddenly clicked, you were inside a jar! You immediately started panicking as you started pounding your fists on the glass wall. Your tiny arms didn't do much in the way of making noise as suddenly the lights around you flicked on. You saw you were in someone's bedroom, the jar was sat on the bookshelf opposite the bed.

Suddenly Hayley in her giant form appeared in front of you with a wide grin on her face, she kneeled down in front of the jar and tapped it with her fingernail.

"How are you feeling little guy? You just passed out on me!" Hayley giggled as she began unscrewing the cap above you.

"Hayley! What have you do...Woah!" Before you could finish your sentence, Hayley had slid her giant fingers in and grabbed you by your arm, pulling you out of the jar.

I screamed in terror and dangled helplessly by your arm, as she brought you to her face. You saw your terrified face in her glasses as you looked down at the huge drop to the floor.

"Now what shall we do first? Shall we..."
1111.title: Inside a jar

choices: Massage the sole of her giant left foot
11112.content:
Hayley carried you to her bed and laid down, resting her head against her pillow as she frowned at you curiously.

"Before bed, I do love to moisturise my feet, and after all that moshing they are incredibly sore", she explained as she peeled off her ankle socks and dropped them on the floor.

She reached into her nightstand and pulled out some moisturising cream. She opened up the pot and put a little on the lid, and placed it by her feet.

"You're going to be my little foot slave tonight, if you do a good job, you may survive to see tomorrow", she said as she placed you by her giant feet, as she wriggling her toes in anticipation.

You begin to...
11112.title: "Get you to work"

111122.content:
You ran towards the foot of the bed, away from Hayley as you felt your tiny heart pounding in your chest. However, your escape attempt was short-lived. Hayley simply leaned forward and plucked you up in between her fingertips, before dangling you in front of her face.

"Well that didn't work out too well did it?" Hayley said, looking pretty angry as she grabbed some wipes, before standing up and heading to the bathroom.

She switched on the lights to the bathroom and headed inside, her bare feet slapping against the tiled floor. You desperately squirmed around, not knowing what she had planned for you.

Hayley simply dropped you on the tiled floor, causing both your legs and lower back to break. You screamed in pain as you heard your bones snapping after the huge drop. You desperately tried to drag yourself away using your arms as Hayley wriggled her toes against the floor in anticipation.

Suddenly, a dark shadow loomed over you. Looking up, you saw Hayley's giant sole and the pads of five toes directly above you. You had no time to react and her foot suddenly came down on you, everything suddenly went black.

Hayley sighed in relief as she felt your tiny body pop and crack beneath her sole. She then lifted up her foot to see a bloody mess on her sole and on the tiled floor. She simply pulled out a wipe and began wiping away your blood and guts, before disposing of the wipe in the toilet and flushing it away.
111122.title: Run away from Hayley

choices: Hayley opened the pantry and pulled out some peanut butter
11113.content:
You gulped hard, you were hardly in the mood for food as Hayley left her room and headed to the kitchen, with you in hand.

You squealed in terror as you swung back and forth in between her fingertips. Hayley's bare feet slapped against the tiled floor as she walked into the kitchen, before dropping you inside an empty glass on her counter. You felt all the wind been taken out of your lungs as you landed inside the glass.

"I do love myself a late-night sandwich, but I just don't know what to have as a filling" Hayley said as she opened her refrigerator.

Whilst her back was turned, you attempted to climb out of the glass, but the sides were far too steep and slippery for you to grip onto as you just landed back where you were. But you immediately stopped as Hayley shut the refrigerator, looking a little annoyed.

"There is nothing I can use for a filling....oh wait!"
11113.title: "Have a late night snack"

111131.content:
You squealed as you were suddenly pulled out the glass in Hayley's tight grip. You desperately kicked and squirmed, trying to get free.

"Please Hayley! Don't do this! I'll do anything you want!" You begged and pleaded.

Hayley simply ignored you, as she pulled out a plate and two slices of bread, before placing you on a slice.

She placed her index finger on top of you, in order to stop you from escaping before lowering the second slice on top of you.

"Now how are we going to do this? I think I'll..."
111131.title: Hayley grabbed you

1111311.content:
You desperately screamed and kicked in between the slices of bread as Hayley laid her hand on the top slice, as she walked back to her living room before taking a seat on the couch.

"Don't worry Liam, this won't hurt a bit! It'll be like a big waterslide...with a slightly painful pool at the end" Hayley chuckled as she lifted up her sandwich.

Her warm breath blew over as you as she licked her lips hungrily before opening her mouth.

As her mouth opened, saliva strings stretched and snapped, revealing her huge tongue, powerful teeth, and dark throat waiting for its new arrival.

You let out a sickly groan at the sight as she suddenly took a large bite of the sandwich, taking you with it. You screamed in terror as her powerful teeth began chomping down on the bread all around you, whilst you desperately tried to stay on her tongue to avoid being turned into mush.

"Please, Hayley! Don't do this!" You screamed and cried, as you were tossed around her mouth.

You were bashed against her teeth and the roof of her mouth, getting soaked in saliva and covered in pieces of chewed up bread. Suddenly, you found yourself sliding headfirst towards her throat as she titled her head back. You tried to stop yourself but it was no use as her throat grew larger and larger before...*GULP*

You were squeezed down her tight esophagus, as her powerful throat muscles pulled you down further into her body. You could hear the sounds of her body as you slid down deeper, the sound of her heart pounding and her powerful lungs inhaling and exhaling air.

You eventually dropped into her huge stomach, splashing into the Vodka she just drunk an hour before. Your new home groaned and gurgled all around you, all of it drowned out by a loud *BOOM* *BOOM* *BOOM*

Hayley patted her stomach, satisfied with her late-night meal as she put the remainder of the bread back on the plate before picking her cat.

"Come on Skippy, time for bed"
1111311.title: "Send you down whole"

1111312.content:
You desperately screamed and kicked in between the slices of bread as Hayley laid her hand on the top slice, as she walked back to her living room before taking a seat on the couch.

"Don't worry Liam, it'll be over with one little bite. No more being a loser. No more being laughed at. Best of all, I get a good meal out of it!" Hayley chuckled as she teasingly chomped her teeth before picking up her sandwich.

Her warm breath blew over as you as she licked her lips hungrily before opening her mouth.

As her mouth opened, saliva strings stretched and snapped, revealing her huge tongue, powerful teeth, and dark throat waiting for its new arrival.

You let out a sickly groan at the sight as she suddenly took a large bite of the sandwich, taking you with it. You screamed in terror as her powerful teeth began chomping down on the bread all around you. You were suddenly flicked up by her tongue as you landed on her molars.

"Please, Hayley! Don't! I beg you!" You cried out as her molars began to lower down towards you.

You cried out and closed your eyes as her upper molars began pressing down on your body. It began with the sounds of your joints popping and cracking under the pressure. This soon turned to your bones snapping as you screamed in pain. After one more notch of pressure, your body burst like a grape.

Your blood and guts squirted out into her mouth as she moaned in pleasure. She continued chewing your bones until they were small enough to swallow. After a few minutes, she let out an audible *GULP* and sent your remains into the depths of her body, before they were deposited into her stomach.

Hayley patted her stomach, satisfied with her late-night meal as she put the remainder of the bread back on the plate before picking her cat.

"Come on Skippy, time for bed"
1111312.title: "Chew you into mush"

1113.content:
You look around in a cool sweat, you looked out your window and your car was parked in the drive.

It was all just a dream, of course you weren't lucky enough to get with your crush!
1113.title: At home, in bed

info.brief_description: The girl of your dreams finds out your ultimate fantasy and decides to take full advantage
info.description:
The Plot
You had a fantastic night at the concert and was still in shock that Hayley agreed to go with you. But now things really were about to take a turn after she invites you back to her apartment. But what you and Hayley had in mind didn't necessarily match up.

Characters
Liam
Age: 24
Height: 5'9
Description: Tanned skin, brown hair, green eyes, slightly bulky but is trying to work on losing some more weight

Hayley
Age: 25
Height: 5'7
Description: Long brown hair, slightly pale White skin, wears glasses, brown eyes, fair body weight

Rules
Only rules are no god-modding and no size changing mid-RP. Once Liam has shrunk, he remains at that size.
Everything else goes, including death.
When adding chapters, please add detail and description - No one-liners
